8186.title: 1. Insider Access Pass
8186.description:
*Pricing is on a per month subscription basis

Your Insiders Access Pass includes:

・A new audio presentation every month – accessible to you to listen to online or download – a $24.95 value each – you already get your full value each month with this feature

・Insiders Access to 3 audio presentations every month – the current month as well as the prior two months

・Insiders Access to video Insider Classes – video of Alan presenting live at conferences around the world – plus the audio version of these topics

・Access to an Insiders Library of Alan’s best articles and blogs – your own research library 24/7/365 access on any desktop or mobile device

All of this for only $25 per month! (USD)

Ready to unlock your Insiders Access Pass, click Get Started below.

8187.title: 2. Premium Access Pass
8187.description:
*Pricing is on a per month subscription basis

You get everything in the Insiders Access Pass plus…

・A front row seat to Insiders Conversations – Alan interviewing speakers, authors and thought leaders on sales, marketing, customer service, diversity, websites and more

・Insiders Extras – – bonus content, discounts and other extras

・First-look at Alan’s new articles and blogs – read them before they’re posted

・Access to 6 audio presentations 24/7 – twice as many as with an Insiders Access Pass

・50% off a private phone consultation/website review with Alan – yes, really with him

・$500 off having Alan come and conduct an onsite sales training or business consulting – Alan can personally work with you and your team, wherever you are in the world – you didn’t know he could come to you, did you?

All of this for only $50 per month (USD) [the sales training discount can save you almost this much alone!]

Ready to unlock your Premium Access Pass, click Get Started below

8188.title: 3. Mastermind Access Pass
8188.description:
*Pricing is on a per month subscription basis

Note: this level is limited to only 12 businesses

You get everything in the Insiders Access Pass and Premium Access Pass plus…

・An exclusive, annual Full-day Mastermind Retreat – you’ll spend a full day, in-person with Alan and a small group of progressive and success-minded individuals. Alan will lead you though discussions on the most pressing issues for the group.

・Two hours per year of private consulting / website review time with Alan (a $600 value) – use it all at once, or break it up throughout the year.

・$1,000 off having Alan come and do onsite sales training or business consulting – Alan will come to your location and work with you and your team

All of this for only $500 per month (USD) – it’s not for everyone, but then again there are only 12 spots, get one while you can – the Mastermind Day and free consulting time alone are worth it!

Ready to unlock your Mastermind Access Pass, click Get Started below
